name: Twin-Ghost
description:
You were split in two. Man and Ghost,  and now you need to explore the dungeon to find out how to become whole again.

Controll your Twin-Ghost to defeat enemies and solve puzzles.

This game and everything in it was made in the 48 hour game jam called "United Game Jam".

Made by two beginners,  SlugeHugo#3317 and Mysterio fåggel#1686

Controlls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot and recall: E

Ghost Swap: Q

Stop Ghost: Space

Ghost Eye: RMB

Freeze Bullet: LMB
